15601.「そ…村王が こんな手紙を残して\n いなくなってしまったのだ。\n 読むから:
So...the Village King has disappeared, leaving
a this letter. I'll read it, just listen...

15602.「……ギュランよ。\n お前を わしの側近としてから\n もう １０年あまりの時:
Guran. It has been more than ten years since I
took you into my inner circle.

15603.「お前に ひとつ頼みたいことがある。\n これから お前には ランガーオ村の\n:
I have a favor to ask of you. From now on, I
want you to build a school for the children of
Langao Village.

15604.「わしは こう思うのだ。\n ランガーオ村の若者たちが この村だけで\n 生涯を:
I think that the time for the young people of
Langao to live out their lives in this village
alone has come to an end...

15605.「ジーガンフや アロルドとマイユ\n そして <pc>のように 前途ある若者が\:
The time will come when young men and women like Jiganf, Arold and Maille, and , who have a bright future ahead
of them, will travel the world and reach new heights.

15606.「だが 若者たちが 見果てぬ世界に旅立つ時\n この村のことしか知らずにいたら:
But when these young men and women set out for the unseen world, it would be troubling if all they knew of this village was what they have
seen. I hope they don't have to...

15607.「お前が 子供たちに この世界の\n 様々なことを 教えてやってほしいのだ。:
I want you to teach the children about the
many things in this world.

15608.「この村で いちばんアタマのいい お前が\n <pc>たちからの協力を得れば\n:
I believe that if you, the smartest person in this village, can get the cooperation of and the others, you will be able
to make this happen.

15609.「とても時間が かかることだろう。\n だが わしからの 最後の頼みだ。\n ど:
It will take a long time. But this is my last
request. Please listen to me.

15610.「……手紙は ここで終わっている。\n これは 村王の……遺書ということか……。:
The letter ends here. So this is the Village
King's... will...

15611.「手紙には 行方は書かれていないが\n とにかく 村王を 探さなくては！\n <:
The letter doesn't say where he is, but we
need to find the Village King anyway!
<pc>! Will you find the Village King!

15613.「ただ やみくもに 走り回るよりも\n 村王が どこに行ったかの情報を\n 探す:
Instead of just running around hastily, we
should be looking for information on where the
Village King might have gone!

15614.「こちらも 手を尽くす。\n <pc>も まずは情報集めに\n 全力を 注いでく:
We will do our best. <pc>, please do
your best to gather information first!

15615.「やってくれるか……。\n しかし どうやら 今は 頼まれごとで\n 手いっぱい:
I'll see what I can do... but it seems you
have your hands full with favors right now...

15616.「取りかえしが つかないことになる前に\n 一刻も早く 手を空けてきてくれ！:
Now go get your hands free as soon as possible
before it's too late!

15617.「そうか……。\n わかった。ならば 仕方がない。: Well... okay. Then I have no choice.

15618.「だが 村王を探してくれる気になったら\n ここに来てくれ。頼むぞ。:
But if you feel inclined to help me find the
Village King, come here. Please.

15619.「おおっ <pc>！\n また来てくれたということは\n 頼みを 聞いてくれるの:
Oh, <pc>! I see you're here again,
which means you'll do me a favor, won't you?

15620.「村王が残した手紙の内容を 聞きたいか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to hear the letter left by the
Village Chief?<yesno><close>

15621.「わかった……。\n ならば もう一度 読もう。: Okay... then let's read it again.

15622.「……ギュランよ。\n お前を わしの側近としてから\n もう １０年あまりの時:
Guran. It has been more than ten years since I
took you into my inner circle.

15623.「お前に ひとつ頼みたいことがある。\n これから お前には ランガーオ村の\n:
I have a favor to ask of you. From now on, I
want you to build a school for the children of
Langao Village.

15624.「わしは こう思うのだ。\n ランガーオ村の若者たちが この村だけで\n 生涯を:
I think that the time for the young people of
Langao to live out their lives in this village
alone has come to an end...

15625.「ジーガンフや アロルドとマイユ\n そして <pc>のように 前途ある若者が\:
The time will come when young men and women like Jiganf, Arold and Maille, and , who have a bright future ahead
of them, will travel the world and reach new heights.

15626.「だが 若者たちが 見果てぬ世界に旅立つ時\n この村のことしか知らずにいたら:
But when these young men and women set out for the unseen world, it would be troubling if all they knew of this village was what they have
seen. I hope they don't have to...

15627.「お前が 子供たちに この世界の\n 様々なことを 教えてやってほしいのだ。:
I want you to teach the children about the
many things in this world.

15628.「この村で いちばんアタマのいい お前が\n <pc>たちからの協力を得れば\n:
I believe that if you, the smartest person in this village, can get the cooperation of and the others, you will be able
to make this happen.

15629.「とても時間が かかることだろう。\n だが わしからの 最後の頼みだ。\n ど:
It will take a long time. But this is my last
request. Please listen to me.

15631.「手紙には 行方は書かれていない。\n <pc>よ。とにかく 村王を\n 見つけ:
The letter doesn't say where he went.
<pc>. Anyway, I need you to find the
Village King. Will you do it?

15632.「<pc>！\n 村王のことは 何か わかったか！:
<pc>! What have you found out about
the Village King!

15633.「その様子だと どうやら\n 何も わからないようだな……。:
From the look of you, I'm guessing you don't
know what I'm talking about.

15634.「とにかく 手遅れになる前に 急いで\n 村王を 探しだしてくれ。まずは 村人た:
Anyway, hurry up and find the village king
before it's too late. First, we should gather
information from Villagers who have seen him.

15636.「おや？ あなたも 旅の方のようですな。\n アッシも 世界を旅しながら めずら:
Oh? It seems you are also a traveler. I, too,
am a Peddler who travels the world buying rare
and exotic goods.

15637.「……むむっ？ ワケありな様子でござんすね。\n ほうほう……。村王クリフゲーン:
Hmmm? You seem to be in some kind of trouble.
I wonder... have you seen the Village Chief
Cliffgain anywhere?

15638.「村王なら この村に来る道中に\n おかしな場所で 見かけたでござんすよ。:
I saw the village king in a strange place on
the way to this village.

15639.「あれは たしか…… 獅子門から\n グレン領東に抜けた辺り……村王は\n そこ:
I think that's the area from Lion Gate to Glen
East... and the village king was heading west
from there.

15640.「なんだか 顔色が悪かったんで\n 妙に 気がかりだったんでござんすよ。:
I was strangely concerned because he was
looking a little pale.

15641.「では アッシは 先を急ぎますんで\n 失礼いたしやすよ。:
Well then, I'm going to hurry ahead and take
my leave.

15642.「<pc>！\n 村王のことは 何か わかったか！:
<pc>! What have you found out about
the Village King!

15643.「……なに？ 旅の商人が グレン領東で\n 村王を見かけたという 情報があった？:
What? Peddler had a report of seeing the
Village King in Glen East?

15644.「村王が グレン領東に行くなどという話は\n 聞いていない……。それは 有力な情:
I haven't heard anything about the Village
King going to Glen East... that's a promising
piece of information.

15645.「よし！ そういうことなら\n 急いで グレン領東に行き 村王を探してくれ！\n:
All right! In that case, hurry to Glen East
and find the Village King! <pc>, you
got it!

15646.「あの ガガベスの 忘れ形見……。\n さぞ強くなっただろうと 思ってはいたが\:
I always thought that Gagai, the last remnant
of Gagabes, would have grown stronger, but
never thought he would be as strong as he is.

15647.「今の お前ならば……\n ジーガンフや アロルドにさえ\n 勝てるかもしれん…:
Now you... you might even beat Jiganf and
Arold...

15648.「自ら 戦いを挑みにきた その勇気には\n 価値があると 認めてやろう。:
I'll give you credit for the courage it took
to come out here and fight.

15649.「だが 相手の実力と おのれの実力を\n 推し量る能力まで 失ったとあっては\n:
However, if you have lost the ability to
estimate your opponent's ability and your own
ability, you are just a dumb old man.

15650.「……老いるということは みじめなことだな。\n クリフゲーン。:
...It's a miserable thing to be old.
Cliffgain.

15652.「どうやら わしに 勝ち目はないようだ……。\n さあ とどめを刺せ……！\n:
It looks like I don't stand a chance now, so
finish the job! Now is the time to avenge your
father's death.

15653.「だが…… 最後に ひとつだけ\n わしの願いを 聞いてくれぬか……。: But I do ask that you do me one last favor.

15656.「お前は 強い……。\n あの村は 強き者を 尊敬で迎える。\n きっと お前は:
You are strong... and that village welcomes
the strong with respect. I'm sure you will be
welcomed with open arms.

15657.「ガガベスに勝った あの日に……\n お前を 復讐の鬼にしてしまったのなら\n:
If the day I defeated Gagabes turned you into
a vengeance demon, then I want to give you
back your future...

15658.「故郷 ランガーオ村で生きよ。\n わしは 誰にも伝えず ここに来た。\n お前:
Live in your hometown, Langao Village. I told
no one I came here. No one knows that you
defeated me.

15659.「貴様に このオレの気持ちを知ることなど\n できるはずがないのだ……。:
There is no way you could possibly know how I
feel...

15660.「残念だが お前に とどめは刺さん。: I'm afraid I won't be able to finish you off.

15662.「オレの目的は お前を殺すことだけではない。: My goal is not only to kill you.

15663.「身体が動くようになったら\n 村に戻って こう伝えろ。\n 死神が この村を:
When you are able to move, go back to the
village and tell them that the Grim Reaper is
coming to destroy the village.

15664.「死神から逃げるか 立ち向かうかは\n お前たち次第だ。だが いずれにせよ\n:
It is up to you to escape or confront the
Reaper. But either way, Langao Village will be
destroyed.

15666.「あの 腐った村を 壊滅させなくては\n オレが この世に生を受けた 意味がない:
If I don't destroy that rotten village,
there's no point in me having come into this
world.

15667.「そして クリフゲーンよ。貴様には\n あの村が滅びる様を 見届ける義務がある。:
And you, Cliffgain. You have a duty to see
that village destroyed. Don't expect me to
just let you die.

15669.「そうか ギュランに頼まれて\n わしを探しにきてくれたのか……。: I see... Guran sent you to find me...

15670.「あれが ガガベスの息子 ガガイ……。\n 若き日の わしが生んでしまった\n:
That is Gagai, son of Gagabes, the young
Revenge Ogre Gagai whom I had spawned...

15671.「戦ってみて 確信した……。\n 今の ガガイの強さならば 本当に\n たったひ:
After fighting, I'm convinced... that with
Gagai's strength now, he really could destroy
a village single-handedly.

15672.「ジーガンフも アロルドも\n 村にいない今 ガガイを 止める術がない。\n い:
With neither Jiganf nor Arold in the village,
there is nothing we can do to stop Gagai. What
the hell am I supposed to do?

15673.「とにかく 一度 村に戻ろう……。\n わしなら大丈夫だ。ひとりで 戻れる……。:
Anyway, let's go back to the village. I'll
be fine. I can go back alone.

15674.「<pc>も 村に戻ったら\n わしの所へ 来てくれ……。:
<pc>. When you get back to the
village, come to me...
